title: Mars in Leo
summary: Drive is confident, expressive, and eager to lead. Actions seek recognition and align with pride or creative flair. The opportunity is to move boldly while staying collaborative and accountable.

meaning.headline: Energy wants to shine and inspire, not hide.

frames.text: Mars in Leo fuels courageous action, performance, and taking up space.
Motivation grows when efforts feel meaningful or visible.
Creative projects and play compete for attention.
Loyalty and heart can guide leadership.
Being center stage guarantees success or agreement.

do: Set boundaries on energy and spending.
avoid: Treating risk as proof of bravery

reusable_lines.text: Lead boldly, and keep the team in the spotlight too.
Pride can power action when it stays aligned with purpose.

allowed_framing: Supportive framing: can boost confidence and leadership
Agency-forward language: you choose how to use visibility
Contextual framing: boldness helps when paired with care

sources: Mars as drive/assertion archetype in daily cycles
